description: '''Rainhard JÃ¼rgen Fendrich''' (born 27 February 1955) is an Austrian singer, composer, entertainer, and actor. He is one of the most successful [[Austropop]] musicians, and his songs are written in [[Viennese German]]. He is very popular in Austria and in Bavaria, but less so in other [[German-speaking countries]] and regions. His song from 1990, "I Am from Austria" (its lyrics, except for the title, are in Viennese German) is still popular in Austria and considered to be the "secret national anthem".
